    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}
// from Haffman Code to a Byte
char *searchPrecode(char *preCode, LeafNodeCode *LeafNodeCodes) {
    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}
// unzip
void deCode(char *codeFileName, char *decodeFileName) {
    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;
    //     while ((searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes)) == NULL) {
    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // modified here!

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes
    char BUFF[16] = {0}; // Code cache
    int len = 0;
    char *value = 0;
    int result = 0;
    int Nwrite = 0; // already written in the file
    printf("\n");
    while (1) {
        int n = fread(&buffer, sizeof(buffer), 1,
                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time
        if (n < 1) {
            // end of the file
            break;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            result = buffer & (1 << (7 - i));
            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';
            }
            value = searchPrecode(BUFF, leafNodeCodes);
            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}
// from Haffman Code to a Byte
char *searchPrecode(char *preCode, LeafNodeCode *LeafNodeCodes) {
    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}
// unzip
void deCode(char *codeFileName, char *decodeFileName) {
    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;
    //     while ((searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes)) == NULL) {
    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // modified here!

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes
    char BUFF[16] = {0}; // Code cache
    int len = 0;
    char *value = 0;
    int result = 0;
    int Nwrite = 0; // already written in the file
    printf("\n");
    while (1) {
        int n = fread(&buffer, sizeof(buffer), 1,
                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time
        if (n < 1) {
            // end of the file
            break;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            result = buffer & (1 << (7 - i));
            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';
            }
            value = searchPrecode(BUFF, leafNodeCodes);
            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}

    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}

    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }

    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;

    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }

    //     }

    //         break;

    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first

        return;

    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =

    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file

                    return;

                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {

    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {

    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}

char *searchPrecode(char *preCode, LeafNodeCode *LeafNodeCodes) {
    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}
// unzip
void deCode(char *codeFileName, char *decodeFileName) {
    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;
    //     while ((searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes)) == NULL) {
    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // modified here!

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes

                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time

            break;

            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';

            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}

        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {

    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }

    //         }

    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // modified here!

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes

    int len = 0;
    char *value = 0;
    int result = 0;
    int Nwrite = 0; // already written in the file

    while (1) {
        int n = fread(&buffer, sizeof(buffer), 1,
                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time
        if (n < 1) {

            break;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            result = buffer & (1 << (7 - i));
            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';
            }
            value = searchPrecode(BUFF, leafNodeCodes);
            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}
// from Haffman Code to a Byte
char *searchPrecode(char *preCode, LeafNodeCode *LeafNodeCodes) {
    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}
// unzip
void deCode(char *codeFileName, char *decodeFileName) {
    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;
    //     while ((searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes)) == NULL) {
    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // modified here!

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes
    char BUFF[16] = {0}; // Code cache
    int len = 0;
    char *value = 0;
    int result = 0;
    int Nwrite = 0; // already written in the file
    printf("\n");
    while (1) {
        int n = fread(&buffer, sizeof(buffer), 1,
                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time
        if (n < 1) {
            // end of the file
            break;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            result = buffer & (1 << (7 - i));
            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';
            }
            value = searchPrecode(BUFF, leafNodeCodes);
            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}

    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}

        return;

                    return;

                    Nwrite++;

                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}

        return 2;
    }

        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}

            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;

        return 6;

    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    //     return;
    // }

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes
    char BUFF[16] = {0}; // Code cache
    int len = 0;
    char *value = 0;
    int result = 0;
    int Nwrite = 0; // already written in the file
    printf("\n");
    while (1) {
        int n = fread(&buffer, sizeof(buffer), 1,
                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time
        if (n < 1) {
            // end of the file
            break;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            result = buffer & (1 << (7 - i));
            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';
            }
            value = searchPrecode(BUFF, leafNodeCodes);
            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}
// from Haffman Code to a Byte
char *searchPrecode(char *preCode, LeafNodeCode *LeafNodeCodes) {
    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}
// unzip
void deCode(char *codeFileName, char *decodeFileName) {
    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;
    //     while ((searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes)) == NULL) {
    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // modified here!

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes
    char BUFF[16] = {0}; // Code cache
    int len = 0;
    char *value = 0;
    int result = 0;
    int Nwrite = 0; // already written in the file
    printf("\n");
    while (1) {
        int n = fread(&buffer, sizeof(buffer), 1,
                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time
        if (n < 1) {
            // end of the file
            break;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            result = buffer & (1 << (7 - i));
            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';
            }
            value = searchPrecode(BUFF, leafNodeCodes);
            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}

        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;

                }

                goto finished;
            }

    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);

    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {

    //     return;
    // }

    }

    }

    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;

            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }

        return;

    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {

    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); //

    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // modified here!

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes
    char BUFF[16] = {0}; // Code cache
    int len = 0;
    char *value = 0;
    int result = 0;
    int Nwrite = 0; // already written in the file
    printf("\n");
    while (1) {
        int n = fread(&buffer, sizeof(buffer), 1,
                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time
        if (n < 1) {
            // end of the file
            break;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            result = buffer & (1 << (7 - i));
            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';
            }
            value = searchPrecode(BUFF, leafNodeCodes);
            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}
// from Haffman Code to a Byte
char *searchPrecode(char *preCode, LeafNodeCode *LeafNodeCodes) {
    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}
// unzip
void deCode(char *codeFileName, char *decodeFileName) {
    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;
    //     while ((searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes)) == NULL) {
    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // modified here!

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes
    char BUFF[16] = {0}; // Code cache
    int len = 0;
    char *value = 0;
    int result = 0;
    int Nwrite = 0; // already written in the file
    printf("\n");
    while (1) {
        int n = fread(&buffer, sizeof(buffer), 1,
                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time
        if (n < 1) {
            // end of the file
            break;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            result = buffer & (1 << (7 - i));
            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';
            }
            value = searchPrecode(BUFF, leafNodeCodes);
            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}

    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}

        return;

                    return;

                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); //

}

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}

    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}

    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;

    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);

    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    uint32_t magicNo = 0;

          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;

    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file

                    return;

                }

                goto finished;
            }

    fclose(inFile);

    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);

    //     return;
    // }

    //     return;
    // }

        return 2;
    }

        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}

            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;

    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);

    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {

    //     return;
    // }

    }

char *searchPrecode(char *preCode, LeafNodeCode *LeafNodeCodes) {
    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}
// unzip
void deCode(char *codeFileName, char *decodeFileName) {
    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;
    //     while ((searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes)) == NULL) {
    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // modified here!

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes
    char BUFF[16] = {0}; // Code cache
    int len = 0;
    char *value = 0;
    int result = 0;
    int Nwrite = 0; // already written in the file
    printf("\n");
    while (1) {
        int n = fread(&buffer, sizeof(buffer), 1,
                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time
        if (n < 1) {
            // end of the file
            break;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            result = buffer & (1 << (7 - i));
            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';
            }
            value = searchPrecode(BUFF, leafNodeCodes);
            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}
// from Haffman Code to a Byte
char *searchPrecode(char *preCode, LeafNodeCode *LeafNodeCodes) {
    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}
// unzip
void deCode(char *codeFileName, char *decodeFileName) {
    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;
    //     while ((searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes)) == NULL) {
    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // modified here!

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes
    char BUFF[16] = {0}; // Code cache
    int len = 0;
    char *value = 0;
    int result = 0;
    int Nwrite = 0; // already written in the file
    printf("\n");
    while (1) {
        int n = fread(&buffer, sizeof(buffer), 1,
                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time
        if (n < 1) {
            // end of the file
            break;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            result = buffer & (1 << (7 - i));
            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';
            }
            value = searchPrecode(BUFF, leafNodeCodes);
            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}
// from Haffman Code to a Byte
char *searchPrecode(char *preCode, LeafNodeCode *LeafNodeCodes) {
    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}
// unzip
void deCode(char *codeFileName, char *decodeFileName) {
    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;

    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes

    int len = 0;

                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time

            // end of the file
            break;

            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';

            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}
// from Haffman Code to a Byte
char *searchPrecode(char *preCode, LeafNodeCode *LeafNodeCodes) {
    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}
// unzip
void deCode(char *codeFileName, char *decodeFileName) {
    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;
    //     while ((searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes)) == NULL) {
    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // modified here!

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes
    char BUFF[16] = {0}; // Code cache
    int len = 0;
    char *value = 0;
    int result = 0;
    int Nwrite = 0; // already written in the file
    printf("\n");
    while (1) {
        int n = fread(&buffer, sizeof(buffer), 1,
                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time
        if (n < 1) {
            // end of the file
            break;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            result = buffer & (1 << (7 - i));
            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';
            }
            value = searchPrecode(BUFF, leafNodeCodes);
            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}

            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;

    return NULL;

    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

                    return;

                }

            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}
// from Haffman Code to a Byte
char *searchPrecode(char *preCode, LeafNodeCode *LeafNodeCodes) {
    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}
// unzip
void deCode(char *codeFileName, char *decodeFileName) {
    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;
    //     while ((searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes)) == NULL) {
    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // modified here!

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes
    char BUFF[16] = {0}; // Code cache
    int len = 0;
    char *value = 0;
    int result = 0;
    int Nwrite = 0; // already written in the file
    printf("\n");
    while (1) {
        int n = fread(&buffer, sizeof(buffer), 1,
                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time
        if (n < 1) {
            // end of the file
            break;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            result = buffer & (1 << (7 - i));
            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';
            }
            value = searchPrecode(BUFF, leafNodeCodes);
            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}
// from Haffman Code to a Byte
char *searchPrecode(char *preCode, LeafNodeCode *LeafNodeCodes) {
    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}
// unzip
void deCode(char *codeFileName, char *decodeFileName) {
    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;
    //     while ((searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes)) == NULL) {
    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

    // modified here!

    // check magic number
    uint32_t magicNo = 0;
    fread(&magicNo, sizeof(uint32_t), 1,
          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
    if (ntohl(magicNo) != 0xdeadbeef) {
        printf("the decoding file is not a zipped file.\n");
        return;
    }

    // Haffman Code
    int numLeafNodes = 0;
    fread(&numLeafNodes, sizeof(int), 1, inFile); // Read number of nodes first

    LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCodes =
        (LeafNodeCode *)malloc(numLeafNodes * sizeof(LeafNodeCode));
    if (leafNodeCodes == NULL) {
        perror("Memory allocation error");
        fclose(inFile);
        return;
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < numLeafNodes; ++i) {
        fread(&leafNodeCodes[i], sizeof(LeafNodeCode), 1, inFile);
    }

    // the size of file
    long sizeOfFile = 0;
    fread(&sizeOfFile, sizeof(sizeOfFile), 1, inFile);

    // coded file
    uint8_t buffer = 0;  // buffer for 1 Bytes
    char BUFF[16] = {0}; // Code cache
    int len = 0;
    char *value = 0;
    int result = 0;
    int Nwrite = 0; // already written in the file
    printf("\n");

        int n = fread(&buffer, sizeof(buffer), 1,
                      inFile); // load 1 Byte once a time
        if (n < 1) {
            // end of the file
            break;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
            result = buffer & (1 << (7 - i));
            if (result == 0) {
                BUFF[len++] = '0';
            } else {
                BUFF[len++] = '1';
            }
            value = searchPrecode(BUFF, leafNodeCodes);
            if (value == NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                // write in

                if (fwrite(value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
                    perror("unzip error");
                    return;
                } else {
                    // recover
                    Nwrite++;
                    memset(BUFF, '\0', 16);
                    len = 0;
                }
            }
            if (Nwrite == sizeOfFile) {
                goto finished;
            }
        }
    }
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

finished:
    fclose(inFile);
    fclose(outFile);

    // // reopen the file, modify it
    // outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "r+b");

    // // erase the last or more bytes in the file
    // int numOfO = buffer; // nums of 0s

    // int lenOf0HaffmanCode = searchOPreCode(leafNodeCodes);
    // if (lenOf0HaffmanCode == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }
    // int DeleteNo = (8 + numOfO) / lenOf0HaffmanCode;
    // if (DeleteNo == 0) {
    //     fclose(outFile);
    //     return;
    // }

    // fseek(outFile, (0 - DeleteNo),
    //       SEEK_END); // 
    // ftruncate(fileno(outFile), ftell(outFile)); // 

    // fclose(outFile);
}
#include "decode.h"

int searchOPreCode(LeafNodeCode *leafNodeCode) {
    if (searchPrecode("0", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 1;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 2;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 3;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 4;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("00000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 5;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 6;
    }
    if (searchPrecode("0000000", leafNodeCode) != NULL) {
        return 7;
    }
    return 0;
}

    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        if (strcmp(preCode, LeafNodeCodes[i].code) == 0) {
            return &LeafNodeCodes[i].data;
        }
    }
    return NULL;
}

void deCode(char *codeFileName, char *decodeFileName) {
    FILE *inFile = fopen(codeFileName, "rb");
    FILE *outFile = fopen(decodeFileName, "wb");
    if (inFile == NULL || outFile == NULL) {
        perror("File open error");
        return;
    }
    // maybe Code
    // char preCode[257];
    // int byte;
    // int tag = -1;
    // char value;
    // while (1) {
    //     memset(preCode, '\0', 257);
    //     int i = -1;

    //         byte = fgetc(inFile);
    //         if (byte == EOF) {
    //             tag = 0;
    //             break;
    //         }
    //         preCode[++i] = byte;
    //     }
    //     if (tag == 0) {
    //         break;
    //     }
    //     value = *searchPrecode(preCode, LeafNodeCodes);
    //     if (fwrite(&value, 1, 1, outFile) <= 0) {
    //         perror("unzip error");
    //         return;
    //     }
    // }

          inFile); // Read magic number at the begining of the file first
